import React from 'react' import { EditIcon, DropdownIcon, TrashIcon } from '../icons' import { TableCell, TableRow, Button, Input, } from '@windmill/react-ui' export class Account extends React.Component { // TODO: Use setters (check non-empty string) and event handlers to update state & push changes to database // onClick() edit button, change row to input boxes on Payee, Description, Category w/ current values as default getAccountType(typeId) { let accountType = typeId switch (accountType) { case 1: return 'Hot Wallet'; case 2: return 'Vault'; case 3: return 'Expense'; case 4: return 'Income'; default: return ''; } } render() { const editClicked = false if (editClicked) { return ( {this.props.account.notes} {this.getAccountType(this.props.account.accounttype)} {this.props.account.balance} sats
) } return (

{this.props.account.name}

 {this.props.account.notes} {this.getAccountType(this.props.account.accounttype)} {this.props.account.balance} sats
{/* To Add In Dropdown {this.props.account.xpub} {new Date(this.props.account.birthday).toLocaleDateString()} */} ) } } // export default Account
